title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus as expected. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will then take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. It only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on, regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
To reproduce:  
1. Open the application.  
2. Locate and click on the first Combo.  
3. Observe that it does not take focus.  
4. Drop down the combo list and observe that the combo then takes focus.
